summary: A small phrase book to increase your linguistic skills in The Tongue of the Dragons!
descriptionHtml:
At a Dragon Bar and unsure what to say? Want to report a crime to the Dragon Police?
Well fear no more for now you have the Dovah Phrase Book which allows you to
say some \"interesting\" phrases.

The book is located in Dragonsreach in Whiterun in the Mage\'s Ofiice this mod pairs
well with my other mod The Dovah Dictionary which can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15106

Hope you have fun.

NOTE: Due to a complaint by a user in the comments section the phrase:

\"Faal Chinese naak doke - The Chinese eat dogs\"

Has been removed, at the time there was no intention of racism and I apologise for anyone who may have been offended by this.

As a result it has been replaced by the phrase:

\"Dahmaan faal Kel - Remember the Elder Scroll\"

Installation just put the .esp file in your data folder. Done!

Many Thanks,
Jedijas
author: Jedijas
